00034 #include "ctk_spu_common.h"
00035 
00036 #ifdef __SPU__
00037 
00038 #ifdef __cplusplus

00040 #endif
00041 
00042 /* for PPU API compatibility */
00043 #define ctk_mbox_write_block    ctk_mbox_write
00044 #define ctk_mbox_read_block     ctk_mbox_read
00045 #define ctk_intr_mbox_read_block     ctk_intr_mbox_read
00046 
00052 static inline void ctk_mbox_read(ctk_uint32_t *data) __attribute__((always_inline));
00053 static inline void
00054 ctk_mbox_read(ctk_uint32_t *data)
00055 {
00056     *data = spu_readch(SPU_RdInMbox);
00057 }
00058 
00065 static inline void ctk_mbox_write(ctk_uint32_t data) __attribute__((always_inline));
00066 static inline void
00067 ctk_mbox_write(ctk_uint32_t data)
00068 {
00069     spu_writech(SPU_WrOutMbox, data);
00070 }
00071 
00078 static inline void ctk_intr_mbox_write(ctk_uint32_t data) __attribute__((always_inline));
00079 static inline void
00080 ctk_intr_mbox_write(ctk_uint32_t data)
00081 {
00082     spu_writech(SPU_WrOutIntrMbox, data);
00083 }
00084 
00090 static inline int ctk_mbox_read_count() __attribute__((always_inline));
00091 static inline int
00092 ctk_mbox_read_count()
00093 {
00094     return spu_readchcnt(SPU_RdInMbox);
00095 }
00096 
00102 static inline int ctk_mbox_write_count() __attribute__((always_inline));
00103 static inline int
00104 ctk_mbox_write_count()
00105 {
00106     return spu_readchcnt(SPU_WrOutMbox);
00107 }
00108 
00114 static inline int ctk_intr_mbox_write_count() __attribute__((always_inline));
00115 static inline int
00116 ctk_intr_mbox_write_count()
00117 {
00118     return spu_readchcnt(SPU_WrOutIntrMbox);
00119 }
00120 
00121 /* for backward compatibility */
00122 #define ctk_mbox_interrupt_count()      ctk_intr_mbox_write_count()
00123 #define ctk_mbox_interrupt(data)        ctk_intr_mbox_write(data)
00124 
00125 #ifdef __cplusplus
00126 }
00127 #endif
